sections.heading: Core Function
sections.content: や lists examples from a larger group - "and" for incomplete lists .

sections.heading: Main Use: Partial Listing
sections.content:
りんごやバナナ "apples, bananas, (and other things)" 犬や猫 "dogs, cats, (etc.)"

Key: Implies there are other items not mentioned.

sections.heading: や vs と
sections.content:
Critical difference:

と = complete list (all items) りんごとバナナ - "apples and bananas" (only these two) や = partial list (examples) りんごやバナナ - "apples, bananas, etc." (and other fruits)

sections.heading: Common Pattern: A や B など
sections.content:
Often combined with など (etc.):

犬や猫など "dogs, cats, and so on" 本やペンなど "books, pens, etc."

sections.heading: Multiple Items
sections.content:
Can list multiple examples:

りんごやバナナやオレンジ "apples, bananas, oranges, etc."

children.heading: Two people doing together (use と)
children.content: ✗ 友達や遊ぶ ✓ 友達と遊ぶ "play with friends"

children.heading: Quotations (use と)
children.content: ✗ 「はい」や言った ✓ 「はい」と言った "said 'yes'"

children.heading: Natural consequences (use と)
children.content: ✗ 春になるや暖かくなる ✓ 春になると暖かくなる "when spring comes, it gets warm"

sections.heading: Comparison Chart
sections.content: | Particle | Type | Example | Meaning | | -------- | -------- | ------- | ---------------------- | | と | Complete | 犬と猫 | "dogs and cats" (only) | | や | Partial | 犬や猫 | "dogs, cats, etc." | | か | Choice | 犬か猫 | "dogs or cats" |

sections.heading: Usage Examples
sections.content: 店で果物や野菜を買った "bought fruits, vegetables, etc. at the store" 英語や日本語やスペイン語を勉強する "study English, Japanese, Spanish, etc." 本や雑誌やノート "books, magazines, notebooks, etc."

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ Partial/incomplete list ✓ Implies other items exist ✓ Often with など ✓ Different from と (complete list) ✓ Cannot use for accompaniment/quotation

Related:

と (to) - And/With など (nado) - And so on か (ka) - Or
